name: Murrie L. HUBBARD, III v. John LEYDEN, Chief of Police

parties: Murrie L. HUBBARD, III v. John LEYDEN, Chief of Police.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
SHEA, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Bruce G. Pollock, Providence, for petitioner.
Amato A. DeLuca, Warwick, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Murrie L. HUBBARD, III v. John LEYDEN, Chief of Police.
No. 84-207-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
June 7, 1984.
Bruce G. Pollock, Providence, for petitioner.
Amato A. DeLuca, Warwick, for respondent.
